title: What is the best song from France that most people outside the country have probably never heard (please include a link)? - Quora

response.answer_text: It was very hard to make a choice, but I think this one is one of the best french song for me, the lyrics, the music, the video clip, everything was great, and this song sounds even more modern in the era of 24/7 news channels…  As I said it’s a hard choice, but this one was the main contender for me:  A song about nostalgy, made in a very subtle way, I don’t know a french who don’t like this song. I take this occasion to pay my respect for an american who wrote some of the most beautifull french songs, and who were very successfull, she has been very influencial, she died too early, and we miss her, what she made is just a hint of she could have done, it was a great loss. And I say that while this kind of music isn’t my cup of tea, as the other songs I chose that said. Her name was Teri Moise:

Thousands of them. So not one, just a few. Pascal DANEL Les neiges du Kilimanjaro (The Snows of Kilimanjaro)  Juliette Greco Bonjour Tristesse (Good Morning Sadness) – English version  Dalida Paroles Paroles (Words, Words) with French & English Subtitles  Marie Laforêt Viens, viens (Come, Come)  Johnny Hallyday. Ma guele (My Muzzle)  Noir Désir - Tostaky  Bertrand CANTAT & Amor Fati - " Le Vent nous portera " (The Wind Will Carry Us)  Shaka Ponk Palabra mi amor  Keny Arkana Vie d'artiste (Life of an Artist)
